pullrequest.title: report zero velocity and torque for special case

content.raw: NP. But I think I should try to be a little more clear on this issue. The Luke hand driver does not output non-zero `motor_vel`, `motor_torque` and `joint_vel` values, while the actual velocities and torques on the physical system are not necessarily zero. This is just an attempt to mimic the hardware.
content.html: NP. But I think I should try to be a little more clear on this issue. The Luke hand driver does not output non-zero motor_vel, motor_torque and joint_vel values, while the actual velocities and torques on the physical system are not necessarily zero. This is just an attempt to mimic the hardware.
